name: Raglin

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally DEF in all Battles by 33%.

skills.name: Repent
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Fills a random ally's Turn Meter by 15%.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.name: Mercy
skills.raw_description:
Removes all debuffs on all allies, then heals them. The heal amount is proportional to this Champion's ATK.
Lvl. 2 Heal +5%
Lvl. 3 Heal +5%
Lvl. 4 Heal +10%
Lvl. 5 Heal +10%

skills.name: Miracle
skills.raw_description:
Revives an ally with 75% HP and a full Turn Meter.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
